name: ParticleAuthService
summary: ParticleAuthService provide auth service, support Solana, Ethereum and more.
description: Particle Auth is a pluggable auth infrastructure for Web3.0 wallets and applications. We support mobile number and email login, providing users with a simple operating experience. Their login account is then associated with a blockchain wallet, which is secured with a "Threshold Signatures vault".
